languages.text: "Если потеряешь эту бумажку, клянусь Троном, еще раз помогать тебе с ней я не стану".

traits.locale_text: "Если потеряешь эту бумажку, клянусь Троном, еще раз помогать тебе с ней я не стану".

languages.text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."
languages.original_text: "Если потеряешь эту бумажку, клянусь Троном, еще раз помогать тебе с ней я не стану".

traits.locale_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."
"Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."
"Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."
"Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."
"Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，如果你弄丢了这张纸，我可不会再替你弄一张来了。”
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，如果你弄丢了这张纸，我可不会再替你弄一张来了。”

languages.text: «Como pierda este papel no pienso conseguirle otro, lo juro por el Trono».
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: «Como pierda este papel no pienso conseguirle otro, lo juro por el Trono».

languages.text: 「この紙切れを失えば、次を手に入れる手伝いはしないぞ。玉座が私の証人だ」
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: 「この紙切れを失えば、次を手に入れる手伝いはしないぞ。玉座が私の証人だ」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr dieses Stück Papier verliert, werde ich Euch nicht helfen, Ersatz zu beschaffen, der Thron sei mein Zeuge."
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr dieses Stück Papier verliert, werde ich Euch nicht helfen, Ersatz zu beschaffen, der Thron sei mein Zeuge."

languages.text: « Si vous perdez ce bout de papier, je ne vous aiderai pas à en obtenir un autre, le Trône m'en est témoin. »
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous perdez ce bout de papier, je ne vous aiderai pas à en obtenir un autre, le Trône m'en est témoin. »

languages.text: "O kâğıdı kaybedersen Taht şahidim olsun ki bir tane daha almana yardım etmem."
languages.original_text: "Lose this piece of paper and I will not help you get another, Throne be my witness."

traits.locale_text: "O kâğıdı kaybedersen Taht şahidim olsun ki bir tane daha almana yardım etmem."
